name: Gemini Trouble
description:
Fast PvP game about surrounding and trapping your enemy! Game made for Game Jaaj 7.

You start in a box-world where everything you do in your side reflects on your twin's world. As you play, more traps are spawned and more danger you have to avoid. The one that steps on the most traps lose!

CONTROLS (customizable, supports joystick):

Player 1 :
Move: W, S, A, D;
Place trap: E;
Cycle traps: Q.

Player 2:
Move: Arrow Keys;
Place trap: Enter;
Cycle traps: Shift.
